entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:05 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
